description: Registry of reusable tools available in ai-dev-standards. Tools are individual functions/utilities that agents can use. This registry will be populated as tools are added to the TOOLS/ directory.

categories.name: Data Retrieval
categories.description: Tools for fetching and searching data (web search, API calls, database queries)

categories.name: Data Transformation
categories.description: Tools for processing and transforming data (parsing, formatting, conversion)

categories.name: Communication
categories.description: Tools for messaging and notifications (Slack, email, webhooks)

categories.name: File Operations
categories.description: Tools for file manipulation (read, write, search, process)

categories.name: Code Execution
categories.description: Tools for running code and scripts (Python, Node.js, shell commands)

categories.name: API Integration
categories.description: Tools for integrating with external APIs and services
